author: Lindsey Sirera
title: Gal Gadot announced her daughter‚Äôs birth with a sweet nod to ‚ÄúWonder Woman‚Äù
text:
Gal Gadot announced her daughter‚Äôs birth with a sweet nod to ‚ÄúWonder Woman‚Äù Alert the Amazons, there‚Äôs a new wonder baby among us! Wonder Woman star Gal Gadot confirmed on Instagram today that she has indeed welcomed her second child, a baby girl. The 31-year-old actress and her husband , Israeli businessman Yaron Versano, welcomed little Maya to the world with a celebratory snapshot, showing both parents and (newly minted) big sister Alma as they appear to stroll the newborn out of the hospital.
And of course, Gal threw a slight nod to her amazing Wonder Woman role in the caption, writing:
‚ÄúAnd then we were four‚Ä¶She is here, Maya. I feel so blessed and thankful for all the Wonders in my life.‚Äù And then we were four... She is here, Maya. I feel so complete blessed and thankful for all the Wonders in my life #family #newborn #grateful 
A post shared by Gal Gadot (@gal_gadot) on Mar 20, 2017 at 11:43am PDT 
While we didn‚Äôt exactly see a glimpse of little Maya, we‚Äôre certain that the precious newborn is cute as a button.
Gal, who tackles the role of the famous, titular superhero in the upcoming Wonder Woman , has spoiled us with quite a few gorgeous maternity snapshots showing off her growing baby bump in months past.
3 in 2 in 1 photo. Strike a pose! ü§∞ ‚úå 
A post shared by Gal Gadot (@gal_gadot) on Mar 19, 2017 at 6:24pm PDT 
Talk about a pregnancy glow! #Nofiltermoment With the daily routine of life, family and work I'm distracted all day long . Today I had a moment with myself when I was looking out the window at the beautiful clear blue sky and realized that I'm 9 months (!!!) pregnant and soon will have a new lovepup as an addition to our family.. could not be more grateful to the universe . Sending you guys some positive gratitude energies. ‚ú® ü§∞ ‚ú® 
A post shared by Gal Gadot (@gal_gadot) on Mar 14, 2017 at 5:06pm PDT 
Well, congratulations again to this new family-of-four. We can‚Äôt wait for even more baby pictures, and perhaps seeing little Maya sporting a Wonder Woman onesie? Here‚Äôs to hoping!
